author: alphavibes
content:
Guys, is anyone aware of EIP 3074? I'm looking for some help around authentication and bulk transactions.
 https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-3074

author: alphavibes
content: Nope. Best I know is it's part of Shanghai upgrade

author: _shemnon
content: It's not part of the shanghai upgrade at this time, it's not "Eligible for Inclusion" - https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md
